ip_byoip_disclaimer_description_point_1: - I am the owner of the IP address range I have entered.
ip_byoip_disclaimer_description_point_2: - I agree to ensure that the IP address range entered is not announced on the internet by several networks simultaneously (multi-homing).
ip_byoip_disclaimer_description_point_3: - This IP address range has a healthy reputation.
ip_byoip_disclaimer_ordering_delay_messa: Please note that this process might take around three weeks. We apologise for the inconvenience.
